Notes: Genealogy books on most Southern states particularly Alabama, Georgia, Virginia. Books include county marriage records, cemetery records, colonial and pioneer families, land grants, wills, and miscellaneous items. Books listing confederate soldiers from Georgia, Florida and Alabama. Official records of correspondence during the Civil War. Various county histories from Alabama and many Southern states. DAR lineage books. Heritage books from every county in Alabama. Census records and other material on Creek and Cherokee Indian Tribes. Census indexes for states of Eastern half of United States. Individual Houston County family histories. Colonial, Mayflower and ship immigration records. Census microfilm from Florida, Georgia, and Alabama. Microfilm of Henry County marriage and orphan records.
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
